summary:
This is the Ultimate Pack of Aragorn son of Arathorn with pack links and saved game,
Aragorn returns to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i609.photobucket.com/albums/tt177/ORgal2/lotr_envmap.png[/IMG]

[heading][color=red]READ THE DESCRIPTION TO MAKE THE MOD WORK PROPERLY[/color][/heading] 

[IMG]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/newuploads/i1276.png[/IMG]
[heading][color=yellow]BE THE HERO,BE THE LEGEND,BE ARAGORN[/color][/heading]             

                                                                              [color=red][heading]REQUIREMENTS[/heading][/color]
                      1) Cloaks of Skyrim by Noodles : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092
                      2) Bracers of Gondor Aragorn by Bucklar : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3015/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=3015
                      3) LOTR Aragorns Combat Tunic by xxfmanxx : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18031/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=18031
                      4) Isilmeriel LOTR Weapons Collection by Isilmeriel : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5727/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=5727

                                                             [IMG]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/newuploads/llb8m.png[/IMG]

                                                                      [color=red][heading]OPTIONAL REQUIREMENTS[/heading][/color]

                     1)Sharpshooters Extreme Graphics Vision ENB - good performance by Sharpshooter8 : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105
 

[IMG]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/newuploads/lpvty.png[/IMG]
